items.value: Dr. Browner: "Wake up man! I need your help."
Dr. Browner: "Common man you cannot leave us yet."
Dr. Browner: "Hurry! we have to go gather up the stress before it multiplies. "
Dr. Browner: "This is not good at all.... "
Dr. Browner: "It appears that you had a concussion...."
Dr. Browner: "I would tell you to take a nap, but since we are pressed with time I will give you a quick refresher."
Dr. Browner: "I know, let me give you a quick presentation from one of my classes."
Dr. Browner : "Open your menu by pushing down the magnet"
Dr. Browner :"This is where your current task and items show and you go to it by selecting check mark."
Dr. Browner :"You only have one coping mechanism right now but you will get others as you play."
Dr. Browner :"Practice a coping skill to deal with the stress effects."
Dr. Browner :"Keep an eye on this metter to know your current stress. You will feel the effects if you are under too much stress."
Dr. Browner :"And of course, the settings button."
Dr. Browner :" If you want to return to the main menu this is your button."
Dr. Browner :"If you want to return to your home base AKA this building."
Dr. Browner : "To put away your Spad this is your guy."
Dr. Browner : "Put away the menu and Look Down. When feet turns green then you can walk"
Dr. Browner :"And you can jump by looking up."
Once upon a time, scientist invented a way to collect stress, by releasing it from people, and then using a device called a Destressor Pad.
So they went around the community absorbing all of their community stressors.
Little did they know that by taking away all stress.. people became less productive "
Thus, they learned that it is better to keep stress balanced to benefit their society.
We were given the keys to manage such stress in our area through assisting in the release of stress, collecting it and keeping it balance within the machine.
Welcome to Destressor! Words of caution: 1. Take a brake if your eyes become tired or if phone becomes hot. 2. Talk to your doctor about using VR. 3.
TIPS* - Take a long, slow breath in through your nose. - Hold your breath to the count of three. - Exhale slowly.

Instructions:
-adjust the speed or reset time
 to your preferences.

-with each number, take a complete
 breath, inhail and exhale slowly
Instructions: -Select colors and draw by looking at canvas and options. -Look away to stop drawing.
Warning:Selecting a setting will close this applcation, and send you to YouTube.

I guess that chicken did not make it 
 accross the road....

Look and Move Chicken to start playing, 
 try to collect drops of corn while avoiding the traffic

Avoid the obstacles,
 obtain the power ups
 and collect the ozondones. Good Luck!

Shine your light at the berry munchin creeters. 
 Scare the bejesus out of them and save the berries!
Match the cards before time runs out.

Ever wished to have telekinesis at some point of your life?
If you have then today is your lucky day. You will go through 5 waves 
 to explore this new found ability. In the upcoming one, you have to push 
 the objects up to earn points. Switch once you get the max of 6 per full lift.
Wave2: This isn't a cash blowing machine, it's more like a flothing coin type of thing.. Move objects around to collect the coins.

Wave4: Want to feel powerful then try to see 
 how many points you can get from smashing 
a ragdoll to the floor. Bigger the smach, the more points.
Avoid the obstacles, obtain the power ups and collect the ozondones. Good Luck!
Avoid the obstacles, obtain the power ups and collect the ozondones. Good Luck!
